input.sentences: my boyfriend and i went to the beach .
we wanted to go down to explore the lighthouse .
we decided it was too far of a walk to get to the lighthouse so we took pictures from a distance .
we climbed further up the hill and enjoyed the view .
output.sentences: The woman's boyfriend took her to the beach.
It was a little chilly that day, especially with the breeze coming off of the water.
The couple explored the little lighthouse.
They took several pictures of the lighthouse.
Finally, that sat down and took in the beautiful view.
